lead_paragraph: The completion of the Booz Allen Classic at Potomac, Md., and Ben Curtis's long-awaited first victory since the 2003 British Open was postponed for another day, setting up the PGA Tour's first Tuesday finish in 26 years. More rain was in the forecast.
